label: 胆沢城
本: The Cambridge History of Japan, Volume 2:  Heian Japan . Cambridge University Press . 1999
説明文: [HW: Fort established by Sakanoue no Tamuramaro (758‐811) in 802 in Isawa, Mutsu Province.  Soon after its establishment, the Pacification Headquarters (chinjufu) was moved from Tagajō, making Isawa the base for control and trade with the northern regions.]  [坂上田村麻呂、陸奥、鎮守府、多賀城]
